Class RuleCondition

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents an individual condition within a rule. Allows building complex logical expressions with multiple criteria.

[Table("RuleConditions")]
public class RuleCondition
Inheritance
object

object.ToString()

Remarks

Rule conditions are the building blocks for complex rule logic. Each condition evaluates a specific article field against a value using a comparison operator.

Key features:

  • Grouping: Conditions can be grouped using GroupId for AND/OR logic
  • Ordering: Within a group, conditions are evaluated in Order sequence
  • Negation: Each condition can be negated with Negate
  • Rich operators: Contains, Equals, Regex, Greater/Less Than, etc.

Example: "Title contains 'news' AND (Author equals 'John' OR Author equals 'Jane')" would use two conditions in group 0 (AND) and two conditions in group 1 (OR).
